data.title: Archived Boys Baseball State Tournament
data.text:
STATE FINALS

Date: Saturday, June 17, 2006.

Site: Victory Field, 501 W. Maryland Street, Indianapolis.

Admission: $9.00.

Home Team: The winner of the south semi-state game will be the designated home team.

Brackets: 4A | 3A | 2A | A

Meet the Teams | Statistical Leaders

Class A State Championship

Final (8 inn.) | Fort Wayne Blackhawk 7, Shakamak 4

> Blackhawk wins second straight state championship, first in Class A to repeat

> Braves' Andrew Nelson named Mental Attitude Award winner

> Final Records: Fort Wayne Blackhawk Christian (25-2), Shakamak (24-8)

Box Score | Recap

Class 2A State Championship

Final | North Posey 8, Hammond Noll 1

> North Posey becomes first back-to-back 2A state champion

> Vikings' Jared Baehl named Mental Attitude Award winner

> Final Records: Hammond Bishop Noll (22-12), North Posey (26-8)

Box Score | Recap

Class 3A State Championship

Final | Jasper 13, Norwell 12

> Jasper scores three runs in last at-bat to win fifth state championship

> Wildcats' Sam Linette wins Mental Attitude Award

> Final Records: Norwell (29-2), Jasper (34-1)

Box Score | Recap

Class 4A State Championship

Final (8 inn.) | Fort Wayne Snider 4, Indianapolis Cathedral 2

> Snider wins first baseball state championship

> Cathedral's Jim Roesinger named Mental Attitude Award winner

> Final Records: Fort Wayne Snider (26-6), Indianapolis Cathedral (31-3)

Box Score | Recap

SEMI-STATES

Date: Saturday, June 10, 2006.

Times: All times EDT unless indicated otherwise.

Admission: $6.00 per session or $8.00 both sessions.

Home Team: The second-named team in each game is the designated home team.

Brackets: 4A | 3A | 2A | A

Class 4A

1. Lafayette Jefferson at Loeb Stadium

Game 1 | Munster 12, Penn 8.

Game 2 | Fort Wayne Snider 6, Zionsville 0.

Championship | Fort Wayne Snider 14, Munster 0 (5 innings).

2. Evansville North at Bosse Field

Game 1 | Indianapolis Cathedral 1, Greenfield-Central 0.

Game 2 | Terre Haute North 6, Evansville Central 0.

Championship | Indianapolis Cathedral 5, Terre Haute North 2.

Championship | Jasper 5, Whiteland 0.

8. Avon

Game 2 | Hauser 5, Orleans 3.

Championship | Shakamak 8, Hauser 7.
